org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone

Class SlopeOneItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone.SlopeOneItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeightedSlopeOneItemScorer

    public class SlopeOneItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    An ItemScorer that implements the Slope One algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long uid,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        uid - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.

        public SlopeOneModel getModel()
